website_summaries.verdict: Great for oversized mats, this bag lets you place your mat in the bag rather than struggle to stuff it in vertically.
pros: Holds a change or clothes and water bottle, too
No more struggling with vertical bags
Features one external zip pocket and one internal zip pocket
Easy access cellphone pocket in the interior
Interior fully lined with heavy-duty polyester
cons: May not hold thicker 28" mats due to construction at bottom of bag

customer_reviews.title: which is great for damp towel/clothes and I imagine will be super ...
customer_reviews.text: My yoga tote arrived today and it is nirvana! Plenty of room for my yoga mat and towels, clothes, wallet--everything I need. The inside has a waterproof liner, which is great for damp towel/clothes and I imagine will be super easy to clean. I got the navy stripes and I love it! My previous bag had a drawstring at one end and the mat would get stuck and it didn't fit my yoga towel. Now I can put everything in one perfect yoga bag! Check out my pics so you will see that it fits 2 yoga mats, 1 large yoga towel, a water bottle, a block and more. LOVE LOVE LOVE!
customer_reviews.author: KitKat

customer_reviews.title: I am in love with this bag!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this bag. The material and quality are excellent. Many have said that it wouldn't fit their Manduka Pro mat, but I rolled mine tightly and it fit. There is enough room for it (big pro mat) and clothes. A block will fit, too, but the bag won't close all the way. It distributes the weight of all the contents very well and is easy to carry with multiple items. For having a giant mat that has never fit in any bag, much less a tote, I am very pleased with this one. And I love the color!
customer_reviews.author: Tamika CM

customer_reviews.title: Great bag but I have a super-sized mat.
customer_reviews.text: This is a GREAT bag and I wish I could have used it. The bag is gorgeous and if your mat fits you'll love it . . . it has a zippered outside pocket and also a zippered inside pocket so you can carry everything you need. It's well made and attractive. That said, I have a super thick and extra long mat and even though I measured for width, I couldn't roll it tight enough to make it fit comfortably in the bag. If you have an ordinary mat, this will work great for you.
customer_reviews.author: JLH

customer_reviews.title: doesn't lululemon mat
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this bag. I read a ton of reviews all over amazon on different bags. I wanted a bag that could handle all of my classes from body pump to yoga. I use a regular thinner mat for body pump and weight lifting, plus gloves and a small foam bar pad (which all fit easily). Problem is this barley fit my lululemon mat length wise near the top of the bag and won't fit laying flat at the bottom. This doesn't really surprise me, I struggle to get this mat into most bags, even though it's their "regular" size mat. I was really hopping bag would solve that problem.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: This bag has a large zipper pouch on the inside and outside so very easy to store keys
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag because the original bag I used to take to yoga class had a zipper and was lined with a very loud plastic. I want to be able to enter and exit class without making a ton of noise. This bag has a large zipper pouch on the inside and outside so very easy to store keys, phone, wallet, sweat towel and other items. The colors are nice and subtle. When I first got this bag it had a terrible smell- chemical smell. I placed it outside to offgas for a couple days and now the smell is gone.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Jones

customer_reviews.title: Fits standard size yoga mat with plenty more room leftover!
customer_reviews.text: Totally confused by other reviews. So many said that their mats didn’t fit in bag and it made me so hesitant to purchase. LOVE this bag! So spacious and absolutely fits my standard size Jade mat and leaves plenty of room for other things! I love that it has two side pockets inside along with a large zipper side pocket too. I keep the book I read to my students in their along with my class notes. Wish it was a zipper close but the three magnet clasps are fine. For me, as a teacher who needs a handful of things each class, it’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: lauren

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I needed something to contain my yoga accouterments, this fit the bill. The top has three magnetic snaps to keep it shut but mine doesn't often remain closed. I suspect this is because I've crammed it full with not only the mat, but foam blocks, strap, towel, mat spray, a sports jump rope and an elastic therapy band. All that to say: it holds a lot of large items, and does so without complaint. The materiel seems good, its true to color and it does the job. Yay!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag just not big enough
customer_reviews.text: Bag just not big as much as described. I tried fitting in a mat 71 x 26, a small Yoga blanket, knee pads and towel, just did not fit couldn’t close bag. I don’t see how the reviews said they put in 2 mats blocks and a blanket. I was disappointed because it’s a very nice bag that is well made. This is a very good Yoga company that cares about their customers,. I have purchased their yoga mats and was very pleased, will purchase from them again.
customer_reviews.author: MCK

customer_reviews.title: Really like it.
customer_reviews.text: I have received a lot of compliments on this bag and I do like it but wish it had about another six inches of height. My yoga mat fits tightly across and adding the yoga blocks completely fills it up. The mat and blocks have to be placed just right to fit or the blocks will fall out. There really isn't room for much else though I do try to stuff a water bottle in the bag. The color is vibrant and lovely and the material quite durable. Easy to handle.
customer_reviews.author: Buckeye Blue

customer_reviews.title: Great Tote!
customer_reviews.text: I've only taken my tote to 2 classes and am still getting used to it. What I really like about it is that besides holding my mat--there's a pocket for my phone, a zipped pocket for my wallet and tissue, another zipped pocket for my eye pillow, and another pocket that I don't have a use for yet! It comfortably fits my mat as well as a towel in the very well lined main part. My old tote was vertical so I'm still getting used to the horizontal aspect. I love the striped fabric, and it seems to be well made. Several other ladies in the class have asked me where I got it. I replied, "Amazon."
customer_reviews.author: MStrath

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome bag. My Manduka Pro Lite fits perfectly in ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome bag. My Manduka Pro Lite fits perfectly in the bottom with lots of room for a towel and other items. There is a zippered outside pocket as well as one inside. And a couple of open pockets inside. It is well made and easy to carry and more important it is the easiest loading bag I have found. Have received many compliments on this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Kimilani

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this yoga mat tote! Easy in and out...
customer_reviews.text: I finally found a mat tote that works. I have a Jade mat, which is extra sticky. It is perfect for yoga but trying to wrestle a sticky mat into a vertical bag is awful. This bag is perfect! My mat pops in and out without a struggle, and it still has room for my mat towel. It also has a small pouch for keys and whatnot. I am so happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Christine McHolley

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag to fit my thicket Manuka may as other yoga bags were too small. It fits wonderfully with room to spare for a water bottle and a yoga block and towel. I love the color and it seems to be very durable. I just wish it closed by a zipper instead of snaps to prevent rain from getting in when walking to yoga in the rainy weather.. a small gripe though. the strap is also large enough to wear across my body which I like. Would definitely recommend this bag!
customer_reviews.author: Penny Lane

customer_reviews.title: The bag is well made and beautiful but it doesn't fit my Manduka PRO mat no ...
customer_reviews.text: The bag is well made and beautiful but it doesn't fit my Manduka PRO mat no matter how tightly I roll it. It didn't even come close to fitting unless I left one end hanging out of the bag which is not an option. The bag is not quite wide enough. I had read others said the Manduka PRO mat would fit but I cannot see how. My mat is the standard width Manduka PRO. Sadly I have to return it and look for a different bag. If you have a narrow mat it you will probably love it. Thankfully returns are easy.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie J

customer_reviews.title: Carry all of your yoga class essentials
customer_reviews.text: This bag was purchased for my mother, who is happy with it. It is large enough to carry her standard size yoga mat, towel, water bottle, and small purse. The bag is well made and she reported that it is easy to carry. FYI if you have a wider mat, it is advertised as being able to accommodate mats up to 28" wide, so I tried to put my Jade Harmony EW mat (28" wide) and it was entirely too wide to fit in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Emily McClure

customer_reviews.title: Functional and Stylish!
customer_reviews.text: Yoga bag is super good quality and can fit many other things in addition to your mat. I like that the bag snaps shut rather than zipping closed the way most vertical bags do, or worse having to slide your mat in vertically.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck&Skylar

customer_reviews.title: Fits standard yoga mat
customer_reviews.text: My mat fit perfectly inside this tote bag! Super cute and durable material. I was also able to fit 1 yoga block, yoga towel, 2 hand towels, and 2 massage balls inside and it still closed..although it was a little tight on a couple of the snaps. Overall I recommend this tote to and from yoga class.
customer_reviews.author: Micah C.

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love with this bag
customer_reviews.text: I got my bag today looks well made and great sturdy material. I ordered the black elephants looks nice. Plenty of storage pockets and quite large lots of storage. If I had one thing to say I use 2 mats if rolled tightly both fit , so I wished it was a bit deeper. All in all extremely happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Robertson

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag
customer_reviews.text: Please note it a a very long bag. But it's perfect. I'm able to fit my yoga mat comfortably, as well as my yoga towel, blanket, one block, a small handtowel, and a second microfiber handtowel with yoga cleaner spray. It has an outer pocket but I don't put anything in and, and the inside pocket I place my phone. This was a very good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Aileen

customer_reviews.title: It’s all about closure
customer_reviews.text: Wide-mouthed bag fits my extra wide yoga mat and more. Two zippered compartments and slots for phone/keys/etc. Three magnetic snaps keep everything in place. Finally, the perfect mat bag. Fabric options are extra bonus. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: DisNY

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS BAG!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I'd love a tote more than my actual yoga mats, and I have some seriously expensive yoga mats. I absolutely LOVE this bag. It's beautiful and the quality is fantastic. It's one of those buys that you end up buying a second one and storing it, just in case they discontinue for some reason. Don't think twice, buy this tote.
customer_reviews.author: Jaqui

customer_reviews.title: ADORE!
customer_reviews.text: This yoga bag is Everything! Thanks to prime it came the next day. It is very well made. I was able to hold my manduka eko lite yoga mat in it without an issue. I put 2 blocks in there and was able to close it but not the middle snap which is still ok! They are sturdy. The bag was carefully and well made. The material is good for holding wet items and or spills you can just wipe it down. I love the pockets with zippers and just how compact this bag is! I’m sooo happy I got it!
customer_reviews.author: Isoke

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME BAG!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this bag! I was a tad bit skeptical, but thus far it has proven to be a great bag. Very roomy; enough for my mat, a change of clothes, wallet, keys, toiletry bag, and book. I like the magnetic closure, however, if they made one with a zipper, I would definitely buy more. Otherwise, I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Harlemstyle

customer_reviews.title: Aurorae Yoga Mat Bag
customer_reviews.text: The bag is large, true. BUT there is no room for the block or a good place to put water and a towel. It doesn't close well with extra items since it only has 3 snaps across the wide top.
customer_reviews.author: Wichita Girl

customer_reviews.title: Love This Bag!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this mat when I got my Aurorae Synergy 2 in 1 Yoga Mat. Bag has pockets on inside for a cell phone and additional zippered pocket on inside and outside. It's large enough for my mat, and items I need to carry with me. Like towel, water billfold and cell phone and more room if needed. Love it and have gotten lots of compliments on how pretty it is. Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This bag looks great and it fits my mat
customer_reviews.text: So practical! No more fussing around with the yoga mat. This bag looks great and it fits my mat, a towel, a water bottle and socks in the main compartment. The inside zippered pocket its perfect for valuables and the outside (also zipped) perfect for car keys + cellphone).
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.G.

customer_reviews.title: I love the bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag is lovely and functional. I use 2 yoga mats, 1 thick under mat and 1 thin top mat. They both fit inside, though snapping the bag closed doesn’t always happen. The only recommendation I would make to improve is a zipper closure vs the snaps. But regardless, I love the bag!
customer_reviews.author: Missy Toot

customer_reviews.title: Great tote bag
customer_reviews.text: I love my yoga mat tote bag! It looks better in person than it does online. I am able to fit both of my Aurorae mats, a water bottle, small towel, cell phone, and keys all in there comfortably. (Note: The snaps will not close with both mats in there.) Customer service is great as well, as I contacted them prior to my order and they responded very quickly and answered all of my questions.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Yoga Tote Mat Used For my Beading Loom
customer_reviews.text: Just love this Bag!!! It has plenty of room for my jewelry loom, jewelry beading tools and my jewelry project that I take every 3rd Saturday to BRING YOUR OWN BEADS. I needed a wide tote over 26" and this fit the bill. The other thing that I like is that it has 2 large zipped pockets: 1 on the inside and 1 on the outside. This way I can carry everything in 1 bag instead of 2.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn D. Solberg

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Barre Bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag is just beautiful! I love the stripped fabric and the quality is great. I can fit two standard yoga mats rolled together, weights, a resistance band and towel. There are great interior pockets for smaller items like keys and a cell phone. I love this bag!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag. Holds everything I need
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag. Holds everything I need. My mat, two blocks, belt thing and I’m able to put my blanket on top as well. Made out of good material. Would definitely purchase again if I needed too
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great organizer for yoga stuff
customer_reviews.text: This bag is very handy. I see others going to class carrying their mats, purses, towels, and water all in their hands. This holds everythino and has a nice zippered pocket on the outside. I carry my mat, mat cleaner, cell phone, car keys, towel, bottle of water and have room for a wallet and glasses case. There would be room for a change of clothes if you wanted or a block and straps. For me, this was a smart purchase.
customer_reviews.author: cereal lover

customer_reviews.title: This bag is awesome! I take a squat pad
customer_reviews.text: This bag is awesome! I take a squat pad, bands, weight gloves, water bottle and notebook. It holds all of it well. I can fit a yoga mat in it too but I can't close it when I have ALL that in the bag. It's really comfortable to carry and I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My wife and I love this bag
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I love this bag. Durable material on the outside with a beautiful lining. You can fit two large yoga mats into the bag with room to spare for a towel and extra clothes. There is also a zippered pouch to place your smaller items. Great straps that are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Scott N.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bag, but didn’t fit my Manduka Pro mat.
customer_reviews.text: The bag is very nice and made well, however it did not fit my Manduka Pro mat. The description say the width is 28” which should be wide enough for my mat, but it wasn’t unless I forced it in there. Will be returning and hope to find another bag that will actually work.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Wanderlust

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag and I think it's really good quality, but it's just a tad too small and my mat barely fits in it. It's really annoying in the locker room at the yoga studio trying to roll it up as tightly as possible and cramming it in the tote. I have a standard-sized mat so I'm not sure why it doesn't fit when this tote has a lot of positive reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Ana B

customer_reviews.title: The size is deceiving to how much it can hold! Great design.
customer_reviews.text: It arrived folded and packed well and at first sight it seems deceptively narrow width and shallow depth. But I did fit in my matt, two cork blocks, a Yogimod towel, a cooling towel in its case, a slim pack of facial wipes and a folded yoga blanket. This is a lot of props and I think I could still fit another blanket! Everything does have to be packed thoughtfully, unlike a traditional gym bag where you can just throw items in, and best of all, evenly weighted and not cumbersome.
customer_reviews.author: B. E. Madriz

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT yoga bag
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT yoga bag! I have a rolled up microfiber towel on the bottom, then a rolled Falsa blanket, then my rolled mat. I also easily fit in two foam blocks and strap. I can also thrown in a book or small tablet. Everything is always ready to grab and go!
customer_reviews.author: M. Dougherty

customer_reviews.title: Excellent yoga bag!
customer_reviews.text: Love this yoga bag, very stylish and roomy. My Manduka yoga mat, towel and 2 extra large blocks fit nicely. There's even inside pockets for your keys and a wallet. Great find!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty yoga bag
customer_reviews.text: I like this bag but wish it was a little bigger heighthwise. With a mat and thin blanket I don't get the snaps closed. It is beautiful material and has nice pocket features.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda L. Ruano

customer_reviews.title: Love this.....
customer_reviews.text: I love this tote bag! I have to say, I was not sure if this was going to work out for me, but it is perfect. I have a Manduka Pro Lite Mat and it fits with much room to spare. I love the long shoulder straps and the fun stripes. It is a quality bag that has made me so happy! I look forward to carrying this bag back and forth to the gym. If you are on the fence I urge you to just go for it and you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kangi

customer_reviews.title: Great roomy yoga bag that looks fabulous.
customer_reviews.text: This is the greatest yoga bag and I have been looking for this larger bag with the two straps for it makes it so much easier to carry a heavier yoga bag and some extra stuff. Best part is it looks so interesting with the woven pattern. Had been looking for something like this for a long time - highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Amy C

customer_reviews.title: ... gray bag with pink wording on the pocket and love the look
customer_reviews.text: I chose the gray bag with pink wording on the pocket and love the look! The bag is very well made and the wide straps make it comfortable to carry on your shoulder. The interior and exterior pockets hold all the necessities so all I have to carry is the bag. As others have said, I wish it were a little deeper so it would snap with my mat and blanket inside but I only carry it from the car and back so this is a minor issue. It was a great purchase for me!
customer_reviews.author: Amagee

customer_reviews.title: Not long enough!
customer_reviews.text: Love the bag but it is not big enough to fit my standard Manduka mat without a lot of pushing and tugging. I thought I could make it work but it’s just too short.
customer_reviews.author: David Record

customer_reviews.title: Fits all your stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! It's the perfect size... not too big or too small and super stylish. And the fabric is awesome! It's also very well-made and fits my yoga mat and I even have extra room for my bolster pillows. It has several pockets too for my phone and other stuff. I love the magnetic closure at the top. I'm really glad I got this bag!
customer_reviews.author: JulieJoyLovezz

customer_reviews.title: Too small.
customer_reviews.text: Is okay. Cute. But too small for mat and block. And I don't like that it snaps instead of zips. On the other hand, it has some good small pockets on the inside and outside. It's not great that it's less wide at the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Favorite Aunt Kathy

customer_reviews.title: I really love this bag
customer_reviews.text: I really love this bag! It doesn't fit my block as nicely as I thought it would based on other reviews but its great to have a bag I can thrown my may in quickly. If you just need a bag for your mat that isn't a hassle this is your bag. I also have a strap, a bar pad, several braces (wrists, knees ect) a towel, and my block in it. It fits everything just can't snap it closed but all in all great bag!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie O

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for yoga mat
customer_reviews.text: This is a good bag for carrying a yoga mat. It helps keep mat clean and has room to put a water bottle, keys etc. Gave it as a gift. Recipient likes it and uses it!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful yoga bag...received multiple compliments. Fits blanket, 2 blocks and bolster. I carry my mat separately with a strap that also can be used in class...so I'm all set. I like using my own items in this type of class so I'm very happy I can carry it all! Several convenient pockets (some with zippers) too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my yoga mat out of the rain and snow!
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this mat. It keeps my yoga mat out of the elements and makes it a stylish way to transport mat and other items to class. I have received many compliments of the textured design and inquiries about where I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: K. T. Fletch

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! It fits my lulu lemon yoga mat, and towel perfectly and has an inside compartment for keys and money. It is an over the shoulder bag (not cross body), which is fine for me. I like that the mat goes in from the side and not the top. I have the grey and I like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Merideth Cedars

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and durable. The fabric is beautiful and pockets are great! Makes going to yoga so much easier!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Drury

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t be happier with this bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag for hot yoga fits my mat towels and water with room to spare any that pocket easily accommodates keys and phone. Could not be more pleased. Love the look of the black and white pattern!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Phillips-Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great yoga bag. Had been walking in to yoga carrying my mat, wallet, cellphone, keys and shoes. It now all fits in this great horizontal bag. No more mat falling over if I tried to use a regular tote.This one was for a gift since I loved mine so much!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Tote to Date
customer_reviews.text: Love this tote. I use to carry my yoga mat and book bag seperately (I go to yoga after class). Now, I can carry my yoga bag along with a change of clothes, and even a few small books and knick knacks. After a few days of use, I can tell that this tote is durable and sturdy--featuring nice thick straps, and cool colors.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This bag is easy to slip your mat in and out of! No fighting with the bag. It has enough room for other things and a large inside zipper. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: I also like that I can place rolled mats right in
customer_reviews.text: Just received mine, and it’s even nicer in person than I expected. Definitely enough room for my two mats, water bottle, and a towel, plus interior pockets to put my keys, etc. I got the blue one with the striped pattern, and it’s very attractive. I also like that I can place rolled mats right in, instead of sliding them into a bag like stuffing a sausage! Will really enjoy this bag!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag, way too long
customer_reviews.text: This is a high-quality bag it both material and presentation, however, it is way too long i find that I am banging into things with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bag BUT the description is not accurate
customer_reviews.text: Great bag BUT the description is not accurate. I purchased a manduka pro at the same time as this bag. The description claims it will fit a mat up to 28" but that is false. My new mat will not fit. Super disappointed as I really like the look of the bad.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: So far it's the best one I've found.
customer_reviews.text: The product is as described. I only paid $25 for it so I think it is a good value. I wanted something that would hold two mats (rolled up as one), block, strap, and water bottle. I can fit the block in but I can only snap the side snaps. It would probably be just fine with one mat. The fabric and construction looks sturdy. I would recommend to the seller to consider adding an external side pocket for a water bottle. There is an external front zip pocket and and internal zip pocket.
customer_reviews.author: KL@SLC

customer_reviews.title: Best yoga bag
customer_reviews.text: Terrific material -- holds my mat, water bottle and pullover easily. Zipper pouch secures keys. This is the first yoga bag that I am 100% satisfied with! Plenty of room and easy to carry. The blue is very attractive and distinctive.
customer_reviews.author: mikeyct

customer_reviews.title: Best ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best mat bag ever - it holds my extra long Jade yoga mat, my knee pad, strap, eye pillow and other small items like my wallet, keys and my drink. Love the pockets and the snap closure which makes it very easy to close. Perfect for my yoga classes!
customer_reviews.author: Barn119

customer_reviews.title: Roomy and light weight bag
customer_reviews.text: Fits my mat, straps, towel and water bottle with extra room. Light weight and study. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Black Multi) light weight tote bag is perfect for my yoga mat and extra items
customer_reviews.text: The (Color: Black Multi) light weight tote bag is perfect for my yoga mat and extra items, which I can secure in the zip pockets. The pattern looks better than the photo. I was extremely pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution !!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a bag to hold my two mats that i use - finally found one that i don’t have to fight with — the top loading feature is what makes this bag so easy to use. Love the colors and it is so comfortable to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Robin F.

customer_reviews.title: I really like the style and having a bag to put my ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it yet, but I did put my new yogo mat in it right away and it just fits (I have an oversized yoga mat). There are compartments for various things. I really like the style and having a bag to put my yoga mat in rather than just sticking one of those straps on the mat and it sitting out everywhere...yuck!! Now, I just need to go to a yoga class!! LOL
customer_reviews.author: Shell669

customer_reviews.title: Great bag! Great price! Super cute.
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag even after taking it to the studio for the first time. I can fit my large manduka mat, towels, water bottles, and personal items with ease. It's a cute bag with plenty of room and makes carrying everything to the studio so much easier. I gave my boyfriend my old yoga strap/bag and I can fit all our stuff in this bag to go to yoga!
customer_reviews.author: CMars

customer_reviews.title: It's awesome! I picked the black multicolored one and it ...
customer_reviews.text: I received this bag 5/29/17. It's awesome! I picked the black multicolored one and it was a little different from what I expected for some reason but it's still very pretty. The two zipper pockets (one inside and one outside) are big enough to fit my iPad mini, perfect for when I'm waiting for sessions to begin. The texture feels very durable. The main compartment has more than enough space without the bag being too bulky. I'd definitely recommend giving this bag a try!
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Great Yoga Bag
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a bag that I could carry a blanket and block with my yoga mat. This bag can hold all of that and with careful arranging can even snap shut. I haven't had a chance to carry it around much yet so we will see if the snaps stay closed. That is the only reason a 4 start vs the 5. I do like the durability of the fabric and the extra compartments to carry my keys, phone and wallet.
customer_reviews.author: LCW

customer_reviews.title: Excellent construction of sturdy fabric
customer_reviews.text: Very stylish!! Excellent construction of sturdy fabric...very well made with solid stitching. Perfect size for all my yoga paraphernalia with lots of extra pockets for cell phone, hand towel, and sunglasses. Easily accommodates my thicker yoga mat...no problem! Would absolutely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: WiscNurse

customer_reviews.title: Needed and got more room
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy it is to get my mat in and out of this bag. I love that it has snaps instead of a zipper. Sturdy and roomy enough for other items like a block, a small towel and my workout gloves. Pockets for personal items very easy to access. Happy with design and functionality. Grey not my favorite, but was priced the best. Think it will work well slung across my back when riding my bike to yoga.
customer_reviews.author: KLouisville

customer_reviews.title: Best bag ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: I saw a friend in my yoga class that had this bag and I had to have one. It was delivered promptly by amazon and it didn't fail to disappoint. I love the magnets (instead of zipper) on the top of the bag. Has space for my double yoga mats, blankets, water and any other smaller items.
customer_reviews.author: beancounter

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I have received several compliments from others in my yoga class. Enough room for my mat, block and anything else that I need for class. The only thing I would change is a pocket for my water bottle.
customer_reviews.author: s.kelley

customer_reviews.title: Everything you want in a yoga bag!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag!!! Got it right on time as usual from Amazon, and it looks better than the pics! The lettering is a nice touch. Material is strong canvas. Zippers are perfect inside and out, and the amount of storage this bag has is much needed. It fits my Gaiam yoga mat to a T with plenty of room to spare. Get this bag! Trust me, you need it!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Love love love my new yoga tote bag by Aurorae
customer_reviews.text: Love love love my new yoga tote bag by Aurorae! I purchased the grey color. Very roomy bag that can hold everything and then some! Can't wait to take it to class:) Shipping was prompt and arrived as scheduled. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: DanceGirl

customer_reviews.title: Prettier in person
customer_reviews.text: I really love this bag. It fits my mat great with room for other stuff. It is strong and sturdy.Looks like it can be washed and the colours are more vibrant in person. The fact that it doesn't look like a yoga mat bag is another reason I like it. It can be used for so much more.
customer_reviews.author: AnnaTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Yoga Bag!!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is very pretty, sturdy and spacious!! I can fit everything in it and I love the pockets inside and outside to store whatever else I want to bring to Yoga class!! I am very pleased with this bag, the colors, everything about it!
customer_reviews.author: DG&RG

customer_reviews.title: Yoga Mat & Blocks Stored Elegantly
customer_reviews.text: My yoga mat tote bag arrived today as expected. I immediately stored my yoga mat and some props inside the roomy interior. I love the pattern and colors on my tote bag! I find the snap closures clever opposed to having a zipper closure. Now for my travel with tote.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Good bag, too small
customer_reviews.text: The bag is a good quality and color. It is way too small for my Manduka Pro mat. Even the Pro light barely fits with no room for anything else. I believed one of the reviews said it is big enough for Pro mat, so I got it, but sadly not fitting.
customer_reviews.author: Val M

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: The bag is plenty big for my yoga mat. The inside is slick so the mat comes in and out in a snap. I’m happy with this purchase. Seems to be made well. Good pockets.
customer_reviews.author: C. Nels

customer_reviews.title: Nice yoga mat
customer_reviews.text: Nice yoga bag. I have two mats in the bag and they fit very well. I wish it were a little longer for my yoga blocks but I am able to put a small towel and yoga strap in the bag. With two mats, you can't snap the bag closed but that's not a big deal. If you only use it for one yoga mat, you would be able to add a couple blocks to the bag. All in all, it fits my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: It's a cute bag but my mat (The Mat, from Lululemon) barely fits in it. It's a struggle to get it in and out. Unfortunately I already gave my other bag away so I'm stuck with it.
customer_reviews.author: C.B.

customer_reviews.title: does the job
customer_reviews.text: I have just received this bag and am happy to say that it fits two yoga mats and two yoga blocks. I have wanted to carry all this gear to my yoga classes in a convenient way, and this bag will do the trick. It seems well made and sturdy. The fabric is pretty.
customer_reviews.author: thebigsuitcase

customer_reviews.title: ... at my yoga studio had this bag & I loved it so decided to get it for myself
customer_reviews.text: Someone at my yoga studio had this bag & I loved it so decided to get it for myself. So glad I did. Very nice to be able to put all my stuff - including yoga mat - in one bag! For the price, I was impressed with how well it is made. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Christine D. Trani

customer_reviews.title: This bag is perfect for a slightly oversized mat
customer_reviews.text: This bag is perfect for a slightly oversized mat. Love the magnetic buttons and the zippers. Plenty of space for extra clothes and a yoga towel.
customer_reviews.author: DY

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag it’s the perfect size I can fit ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag it’s the perfect size I can fit my yoga mat and any thing else I need. Love it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bella Lily and Lola’s

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Bargain!
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous quality! My new Manduka rubber yoga mat is a little thicker and heavier than my last one and this bag is perfect! Still room for extras and the handles are the perfect length. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth C. Handley

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I love my bag...it hasn’t room for water, towel keys phone and extra clothes. I bought my yoga mat as well and it has eloped my practice by 100%. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Nice construction and large size. It fits my large Yoga mat, large towel, water bottle, jacket, and smaller towel quite nicely.
customer_reviews.author: mbat

customer_reviews.title: Big Tote Bag A Winner!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! This tote bag carries both of my mats!
customer_reviews.author: SUEZY-Q

customer_reviews.title: Roomy, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Nothing negative to say about this bag. Great size-plenty of room for my mat plus towel, water bottle, phone, etc... Really well made. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Anislandgirl

customer_reviews.title: Great yoga bag!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great yoga bag! I can put in my yoga mat, my towel, phone, water bottle, keys and have plenty of room leftover. It closes with three snaps and they are pretty secure too.
customer_reviews.author: sn315on

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! It's very well made and the colors are rich and colorful. My new yoga mat fits in there perfectly and there are several pockets to hold all my stuff. There is a nice medium size zippered pocket on the outside of the bag, another on the inside and two smaller pockets on the inside as well. There is plenty of room to fit a water bottle, towel and other things inside the bag along with my mat.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Schoel

customer_reviews.title: pretty & functional
customer_reviews.text: bought navy blue pattern. very nice fabric/colors. pockets are perfect to hold phone, keys, wallet. long & wide enough to hold my thick mat plus my water bottle will fit at the end. plenty of room for my strap & small towel. my block will fit, but the bag will not snap up with the block inside. very happy with my purchase, get complements on it.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Filion

customer_reviews.title: That it maybe challenging to get a 23 inch mat in this bag. My bag is heavy
customer_reviews.text: I needed a longer bag. Measurements should have been correct. I’m using it anyway. I just have to work a little to get it in. I like the material of the bag. It’s not too lightweight but very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Mary p.

customer_reviews.title: Great Service & Product
customer_reviews.text: Great service, shipping speed and product. Yoga mat tote is stylish, practical (straps good length, lots of pockets), quality materials and workmanship. I may buy another one! Very happy with purchase. Came several days early, another bonus.
customer_reviews.author: GMM

customer_reviews.title: the bag is beautiful and there is room for a mat
customer_reviews.text: the bag is beautiful and there is room for a mat, a block, maybe two, a change of clothes, a water bottle and a small journal. It might be possible to squeeze a towel in there as well. My only issue is that my mat is 26 inches long so the bag is really snug length wise. I'm hoping in time, the fabric will stretch a little.
customer_reviews.author: renya

customer_reviews.title: Finally easy to carry all my yoga stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I use two mats, a blanket, and a strap. I can fit all in the bag. It seems perfectly balanced and is very easy to carry. I love having zipped and unzipped pockets for phone, keys, sunglasses, etc.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: High Quality, Beautiful and Practical
customer_reviews.text: This high quality bag is beautiful! My two yoga mats fit comfortably as well as my towel. It's going to be a favorite for a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Great yoga bag
customer_reviews.text: Fits either of my yoga mats. My only slight complaint is that the water bottle doesn’t fit in any of the pockets upright. Everything else works great! This is the second bag I ordered, first one is still holding up. By the time I order my 3rd bag I am hoping they will create a pocket for my water bottle on the side corner of the bag. It would be nice to see different prints/ colors as well!
customer_reviews.author: cd

product_meta.title: Aurorae Yoga Mat Bag, Extra Large Yoga Mat Carrier, Yoga Bag with Room for Yoga Accessories, Easy Access snap Closure, Large Outside and Inside Pockets with Secure Zipper Closures
product_meta.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Package Dimensions :13.7 x 11.4 x 1.6 inches; 15.84 Ounces
 * Item model number :FBA_YT0094
 * Date First Available :June 30, 2015
 * Manufacturer :Aurorae
 * ASIN :B010OHP3AA

 * 

 * Customer Reviews:4.7 out of 5 stars478 ratings
feature_bullets: Yoga Mat Bag, extra large tote, carryall with plenty of room for standard and premimum yoga mats up to 28 inches wide
The Navy stripe Pura Vida pattern is coated for water resistance and durability
Magnetic snap closures allow for easy access to your yoga accessories, clothing, and personal belongings

Secure your valuables in the one external zip pocket or the one internal zip pocket; easy access cellphone pocket in interior and interior is fully lined with durable heavy duty polyester for easy clean up, and is designed in our unique Yogi Pose print pattern
2 year warranty from date of purchase by owner; mats not included and are sold separately
